channel.title: Comments on: Every dance is made of steps
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description: That sucks that you didn't meet anyone you clicked with. But my mother always tells me there are worse things than being single:) Anyhoo, perhaps you were just meant to be able to chat with your ex... The world is a strange place. I would love to find out more about the whole night though...the idea of what kind of people you ran into really intrigues me!!!
item.content:encoded: That sucks that you didn’t meet anyone you clicked with. But my mother always tells me there are worse things than being single:) Anyhoo, perhaps you were just meant to be able to chat with your ex… The world is a strange place. I would love to find out more about the whole night though…the idea of what kind of people you ran into really intrigues me!!!
